cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5976, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 198 (Monday, November 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KINZINGER:
H.R. 5976.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clauses 7, 17, and 18.
[Page H6267]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 101 West Walnut Street in Watseka, Illinois, as the "Sgt. Jeremy C. Sherman Post Office Building".
